message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be of great value to you.  Given its unique features, I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I can accept.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $11,000 is still a bit high for my budget.  How about $10,000?
